reviewText: Now if you want a makiwara go to [....]. And if you want to get strong enough to use a makiwara without hurting yourself buy the Punch/Block Power Charger.

This video shows the author using a Makiwara but has no explanations of any kind. You can get some ideas on different methods of striking a Makiwara but it really needs some explanations and instructions on proper Makiwara use. Hopefully there are better videos out there on this subject.
